meanings.definition: An area of land with a naturally accumulated layer of peat.
meanings.sent1: The peatland was a vast expanse of wet ground.
meanings.sent2: Birds often nest in the peatland near the lake.
meanings.sent3: The frogs in the peatland had a peat party.
meanings.sent4: The peatland was like a sponge, soaking up all the rain.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the peatland felt like stepping on a giant mattress.
